text: Two Dock Landing Ships of the United States Navy have been named USS Tortuga, after the Dry Tortugas, islands off Florida. * The first was commissioned in 1945, in action during the Korean War and the Vietnam War, and decommissioned in 1970. * The second was commissioned in 1990 and is on active service as of 2016. Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Tortuga
